author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Team Telekom) - Telekom Race Cyclist and Television Motorbike Review
review:
This is a good little set to have - even if you want to build a bike team. This set may doesn't have many play features but it's still a nice and easy build. We only get a sticker for the torso of the cyclist minifig which I didn't like. These vehicles are very easy to maneuver and I can't complain much about it. As I told you in the beginning: It's a good little set to have - even for pieces which you can use for MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
